task_name: Company News Website with Categories and Tags
user_prompt: Design a simple website to display company news.
design_principles: Responsive design for all device sizes
Use shadcn/ui for consistent UI components
SEO-friendly structure for better search visibility

functionalities.description: Display list of company news articles
functionalities.workflow: Users access the homepage to view a paginated list of news article summaries, each showing title, date, and excerpt. Clicking an article leads to its full content.

functionalities.description: Individual news article pages with full content
functionalities.workflow: Users click an article from the list to view a dedicated page with the full article text, metadata, and related articles.

functionalities.description: Categories system for organizing news by type
functionalities.workflow: Users can filter articles by selecting a category from a dropdown or sidebar menu, displaying only articles in that category.

functionalities.description: Tags functionality for flexible content labeling
functionalities.workflow: Users can click on tags displayed on articles or in a tag cloud to view all articles with that tag.
Dedicated pages for each category and tag show filtered article lists, accessible via navigation menus or search.

functionalities.description: Search functionality to find specific articles
functionalities.workflow: Users enter keywords in a search bar, and results display matching articles with highlighted keywords.
A mobile-friendly navbar includes a collapsible category menu for easy access across devices.

functionalities.description: Article metadata display (date, author, category, tags)
functionalities.workflow: Each article page shows metadata below the title, styled consistently with shadcn/ui components.
Users navigate through article lists using numbered pagination controls at the bottom of the page.
At the bottom of each article, a section displays related articles based on shared categories or tags.
Each article includes buttons to share on platforms like Twitter and LinkedIn, opening pre-filled share dialogs.

functionalities.description: SEO optimization with meta tags and structured data
functionalities.workflow: Articles include meta tags and JSON-LD structured data, automatically generated for search engine visibility.

additional_notes: The website will use Next.js with shadcn/ui components for a modern, professional appearance. Focus on clean content presentation and easy navigation through categories and tags. Consider implementing a content management system or API integration for easy news updates.
